description: Try our easy to follow Easy Apple Glazed Ham recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Easy Apple Glazed Ham Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: To prepare the ham, preheat the oven to 160°C. Grease a large, shallow roasting pan. Line with greased foil, then baking paper. Sit the ham on a wire rack over roasting tray. Use a small, sharp knife to cut around ham shank.

Add 2 cups water to tray and bake for 20 minutes to help separate the skin from the meat. Remove from oven, then, when cool enough to handle, carefully run knife under the skin, around the edge of the ham. Gently lift off the skin in one piece by running your fingers between the rind and the fat. Score ham with horizontal lines spaced 1cm apart. Add apple and onion to pan. Brush ham with one third of the glaze.

Increase oven to 200°C and bake ham, brushing with remaining glaze and pan juices every 30 minutes, for a further 1 hour 30 minutes or until ham is golden and sticky and apples and onions are softened and cooked through. If ham should begin to burn or colour too much, cover loosely with foil. Place ham, roasted apples and onions on a platter and serve scattered with rosemary sprigs.
